name: IT One
tag_list: it, marketing, communation, events, community, appsdev, finance, infrahosting, security, eaas, telco, advisory, surveys, people, e-world, training, buzz, sme, mobil-it, vendors, creativ-it, knowledge, cioclub
overview:
Founded in 2007, IT One is THE Luxembourgish ICT platform par excellence.

Objectives:

IT One strives for ICT community recognition, the enhancement of the IT sector and IT functions as well as the widespread of the best practices, products and services.

Its leading Luxembourg web portal: www.itone.lu deals with IT trends and issues at a national and international scale. Thanks to an on-going inventory of the IT Community, IT One also organises events which gather prominent IT actors in order to galvanize the Luxembourg IT community and spark emulation.

Achievements:

IT One gathers all together key actors from the IT community during the greatest annual event so called Gala IT One.

It awards best national practices with the prestigious Luxembourg ICT Awards, voted by 50 influential national CIOs.

IT One also favours international meetings through the first European event dedicated to ICT innovation: the ICT Spring Europe.

What we do and how we do:

  • 45 e-newsletters per year to 4600 subscribers
  • Monthly networking cocktails and conferences each year
  • Permanent inventory of the ICT community
  • Emulation & Networking
  • a who’s who of 6000 ICT Decision-makers

Don’t hesitate to contact us in order to benefit from all these offers and enter the IT One movement!
